CustomField.description: The DBA name of a company. Because Lead.Name is Read Only, this field is editable by NSRs so that, in the case where the company name provided in the lead is different than the DBA name, the NSR can update the lead with the DBA name.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Lead's company name is different than the DBA name, enter the DBA name here.
CustomField.label: DBA
